sentences: Tottenham drew 1-1 with the opponent.

data.tweet: With 0.7 expected goals, Tottenham created fewer good goal-scoring chances than West Ham (1.1 xG) and considerably less than they did in their previous game (2.8 xG against Nottingham Forest).
sentences: Tottenham only created 0.7 xG worth of chances.
West Ham created 1.1 xG worth of chances.
Tottenham created 2.8 xG worth of chances in their previous game (against Nottingham Forest).
story: Expected goals (in last match v Nott'ham Forest)

data.tweet: Tottenham did however pose a threat, carrying the ball into the opponent's box nine times. West Ham made two carries into the Spurs box, while 4.4 times per 90 is the average for Premier League teams this season.
sentences: Tottenham carried the ball into the opponent's box nine times.
West Ham carried the ball into the opponent's box two times.
Premier League teams carry the ball into the opponent's box an average of 4.4 times per 90 minutes.
story: Carries into the penalty area (league average)

data.tweet: Tottenham carried the ball a combined distance of 1,548 yards towards the opponent's goal, while West Ham only managed 695 yards. Spurs also completed eight passes into the opponent's box, compared with three for West Ham.
sentences: Tottenham carried the ball a combined distance of 1548 yards towards the opponent's goal.
West Ham carried the ball a combined distance of 695 yards towards the opponent's goal.
Tottenham played eight successful balls into the opponent's box.
West Ham only managed to play three successful balls into the opponent's box.

data.tweet: Tottenham made four interceptions in this match, considerably less than West Ham's 14. In their last match (against Nottingham Forest) Spurs made 23 interceptions, while this season they have averaged 16 per match.
sentences: Tottenham made four interceptions.
West Ham made 14 interceptions.
In their last game (against Nottingham Forest) Tottenham made 23 interceptions.
This season, Tottenham have averaged 16 interceptions per 90 minutes.
Premier League teams have averaged 14 interceptions per 90 minutes.
story: Interceptions (in last match v Nott'ham Forest)

data.tweet: Ivan Perisic, our man of the match, created some of the best chances of the game - tallying an xA of 0.2 (joint most of anyone on the pitch, alongside Vladimir Coufal).
